00011 /**
00012 * @brief Initializator of Simpson class.
00013 * @param filename Name of the file to write into.
00014 * @param model The model which the data will be extracted.
00015 */
00016 void Simpson::Initialize_Simpson(Model^ model, String^ filename)
00017 {
00018         SystemModel=model;
00019         FileName=filename;
00020 
00021         String^ temp=gcnew String("");                  //channel strings
00022         String^ ChannelList=gcnew String("");   //Total channels string
00023         int j=0;
00024 
00025         //Creating channel list and dtagrid with channels
00026         for each(int i in SystemModel->AtomCollection->Keys) 
00027         {
00028                 //Create the channel string from the mass and elements
00029                 temp=" "+((Atom^)SystemModel->AtomCollection[i])->isotope->Mass+
00030                         ((Atom^)SystemModel->AtomCollection[i])->isotope->Element;
00031 
00032                 //Check if does not exist already
00033                 if(!ChannelList->Contains(temp)) 
00034                 {
00035                         //Add line in the datagridview and fill the line with the channel string
00036                         ChanneldataGridView->Rows->Add();
00037                         ChanneldataGridView[1,j]->Value=temp;
00038                         ChanneldataGridView[0,j]->Value=true;
00039                         j++;
00040 
00041                         //Add the channel string in the total channels string 
00042                         ChannelList+=temp;
00043                 };
00044         };
00045 }

00047 /**
00048 * @brief Function for writing in the file all the data.
00049 * @param filename Name of the file to write into.
00050 */
00051 void Simpson::WriteFile(String^ filename)
00052 {
00053         //Create and open the file
00054         WritingFile=gcnew FileStream(filename,FileMode::Create);
00055 
00056         //Euler angles object, values and isotropic, anisotropic etc
00057         EulerAngles^ euleran;
00058         double alpha, beta, gamma;
00059         double iso, aniso, hta;
00060 
00061         //Quadropolar order read by the combo box option
00062         int QuadOrder=(OrdercomboBox->Text=="1st"? 1: 2);
00063 
00064         String ^ FileText=gcnew String("");  //The Text written in the file
00065 
00066         //Some signature staff
00067         FileText="# Produced by Spinach GUI "+ SpinachGUIver+" \r\n \r\n";
00068         FileText+="#--------------------------------------------------------------------\r\n";
00069         FileText+="#System Name:"+FileName+" \r\n";
00070         FileText+="#--------------------------------------------------------------------\r\n \r\n";
00071         FileText+="spinsys { \r\n";
00072 
00073         //Print Atoms
00074         String^ AtomList=gcnew String("");
00075         String^ IndexList=gcnew String("");
00076         String^ SpinachGUIIndex=gcnew String("");
00077         String^ ChannelList=gcnew String("");
00078         String^ temp=gcnew String("");
00079         String^ temp2=gcnew String("");
00080         Dictionary <int, int>^ AtomIDs=gcnew Dictionary<int, int>();
00081         ArrayList^ SortedAtomList=gcnew ArrayList();
00082         AtomsDictionary^ AtomCollection=gcnew AtomsDictionary(SystemModel->InteractionCollection);
00083         int j=1;
00084 
00085         //First add atoms in a new array
00086         for each(int i in SystemModel->AtomCollection->Keys) 
00087         {
00088                 SortedAtomList->Add(((Atom^)SystemModel->AtomCollection[i]));
00089         };
00090 
00091         //Sorting according to element name
00092         SortedAtomList->Sort(gcnew ComparerElement);
00093 
00094         //If sorted option is on then put the sorted collection into the AtomCollection or
00095         // else put the original
00096         if(SortcheckBox->Checked) 
00097                 for(int i=0;i<SortedAtomList->Count;i++)  AtomCollection->Add((Atom ^)SortedAtomList[i]);
00098         else AtomCollection=SystemModel->AtomCollection;
00099 
00100         //Loop over all atoms except electrons
00101         for each(int i in AtomCollection->Keys) 
00102         {
00103                 if(((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->isotope->Element!="e")
00104                 {
00105                         //Create a string with mass number and element, and add in the atomList
00106                         temp=" "+((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->isotope->Mass+
00107                                 ((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->isotope->Element;
00108                         AtomList+=temp;
00109 
00110 
00111                         //Create spaced String with the same length as the Atom
00112                         temp2 = gcnew String(" ",0, temp->Length);
00113                         temp2=temp2->Insert(1, Convert::ToString(j));
00114                         IndexList+=temp2->Remove(temp->Length); //Reduced it to original size
00115 
00116                         //Similarly for writing SpinachGUI Indexes
00117                         temp2 = gcnew String(" ",0, temp->Length);
00118                         temp2=temp2->Insert(1, Convert::ToString(((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->getID()));
00119                         SpinachGUIIndex+=temp2->Remove(temp->Length); //Reduced it to original size
00120 
00121                         //Try to save a list of all unique IDs
00122                         try 
00123                         {
00124                                 AtomIDs->Add(((Atom^)AtomCollection[i])->ID, j++);
00125                         }
00126                         catch (ArgumentException^)
00127                         {
00128                                 MessageBox::Show("AtomID declared twice", "Error", 
00129                                         MessageBoxButtons::OK, MessageBoxIcon::Error) ;
00130                         };
00131                 };
00132         };
00133 
00134         //Loop over all channels
00135         for(int i=0;i<ChanneldataGridView->Rows->Count;i++) 
00136         { 
00137                 //Write in the channel list anly the ones that are on
00138                 if(Convert::ToInt32(ChanneldataGridView[0,i]->Value)) ChannelList+=ChanneldataGridView[1,i]->Value;
00139         }
00140 
00141         //Write all the above in the stream in the correct format
00142         FileText+="     channels "+ChannelList+"\r\n";
00143         FileText+="     nuclei "+AtomList+"\r\n";
00144         FileText+="# Atom Index "+ IndexList+"\r\n";
00145         FileText+="# SpinachGUI "+ SpinachGUIIndex+"\r\n";
00146 
00147         //For printing Interactions
00148         String ^ ChemicalShift=gcnew String("");
00149         String ^ JCoupling=gcnew String("");
00150         String ^ Dipolar=gcnew String("");
00151         String ^ Quadrupolar=gcnew String("");
00152 
00153         //Loop over all interactions
00154         for each(int i in SystemModel->InteractionCollection->Keys)
00155         {
00156                 //For Chemical shifts, jcouplings and quadropolar interactions
00157                 if(((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->IntKind==InteractionKind::Shift ||
00158                         ((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->IntKind==InteractionKind::Jcoupling||
00159                         ((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->IntKind==InteractionKind::Quadrupolar)
00160                 {
00161                         //Calculate euler angles object form this function
00162                         euleran=EulerAnglesfromEigenVectors(((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->dcm);
00163 
00164                         //Convert angles to degrees 
00165                         alpha=float(180.0f*euleran->alpha/PI);
00166                         beta=float(180.0f*euleran->beta/PI);
00167                         gamma=float(180.0f*euleran->gamma/PI);
00168 
00169                         //Isotorpic Factor
00170                         iso=(((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->eigen[0]+
00171                                 ((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->eigen[1]+
00172                                 ((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->eigen[2])/3.0f;
00173 
00174                         double yy=1000000.0f,xx,zz=iso;
00175                         //Find from abs(s_zz-s_iso)>=abs(s_xx-s_iso)>=abs(s_yy-s_iso)
00176                         for(int jj=0;jj<3;jj++)
00177                         {
00178                                 if(abs(((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->eigen[jj]-iso)>=abs(zz-iso))
00179                                         zz=((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->eigen[jj];
00180                                 if(abs(((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->eigen[jj]-iso)<=abs(yy-iso))
00181                                         yy=((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->eigen[jj];
00182                         };
00183                         for(int jj=0;jj<3;jj++)
00184                         {
00185                                 if(((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->eigen[jj]!=zz &&
00186                                         ((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->eigen[jj]!=yy)
00187                                         xx=((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->eigen[jj];
00188                         };
00189 
00190                         //Anisotorpic Factor etc
00191                         aniso=zz-iso;
00192                         if(abs(aniso)<1.0e-10) aniso=hta=0.0f;
00193                         else hta=(yy-xx)/aniso;
00194 
00195                         //Write Chemical shift in appropriate format
00196                         if(((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->IntKind==InteractionKind::Shift)
00197                         {
00198                                 ChemicalShift+="        shift "+AtomIDs[((Tensor^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->A->ID]+" "+
00199                                         To_String(iso)+"p "+ To_String(aniso)+"p "+To_String(hta)+" "+
00200                                         To_String(alpha)+" "+ To_String(beta)+" "+ To_String(gamma)+" \r\n";
00201                         };
00202 
00203                         //Write J-coupling in appropriate format
00204                         if(((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->IntKind==InteractionKind::Jcoupling)
00205                         {
00206                                 JCoupling+="    jcoupling "+
00207                                         AtomIDs[((Tensor^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->A->ID]+" "+
00208                                         AtomIDs[((Tensor^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->B->ID]+" "+
00209                                         To_String(iso)+" "+ To_String(aniso)+" "+To_String(hta)+" "+
00210                                         To_String(alpha)+" "+ To_String(beta)+" "+ To_String(gamma)+" \r\n";
00211                         };
00212 
00213                         //Write Quadrupolar coupling in appropriate format
00214                         if(((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->IntKind==InteractionKind::Quadrupolar)
00215                         {
00216                                 //nuclear spin quantum number
00217                                 double NSQN=((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->A->isotope->Spin; 
00218                                 double C_q;
00219 
00220                                 //Calculation of C_q factor =2I*(2I-1)*1.0e-6 Hz
00221                                 C_q=((Tensor^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->matrix3x3[8]*
00222                                         (2*NSQN*(2*NSQN-1))*1.0e-6;
00223 
00224 
00225                                 Quadrupolar+="  quadrupole "+
00226                                         AtomIDs[((Tensor^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->A->ID]+" "+
00227                                         Convert::ToString(QuadOrder)+" "+ 
00228                                         To_String(C_q)+" "+
00229                                         To_String(hta)+" "+
00230                                         To_String(alpha)+" "+ To_String(beta)+" "+ To_String(gamma)+" \r\n";
00231                         };
00232 
00233                 } //For writing dipolar couplings that are higher than the threshold
00234                 else if(((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->IntKind==InteractionKind::CBond
00235                         && ((Tensor^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->matrix3x3[0]<=Convert::ToDouble(DipolarThreshold->Value))
00236                 {
00237                         //Calculate euler angles object form this function
00238                         euleran=EulerAnglesfromEigenVectors(((Interaction^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->dcm);
00239 
00240                         alpha=0.0f;
00241                         //Calculate the distance in each direction
00242                         double x=((Tensor^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->A->X-((Tensor^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->B->X;
00243                         double y=((Tensor^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->A->Y-((Tensor^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->B->Y;
00244                         double z=((Tensor^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->A->Z-((Tensor^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->B->Z;
00245 
00246                         //For bonds-distnces larger than zero
00247                         if(((Tensor^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->matrix3x3[0] > std::numeric_limits<double>::epsilon())
00248                                 beta=acos(z/((Tensor^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->matrix3x3[0])*(180/PI); //Theta and convert to degrees
00249                         else beta=0.0;
00250 
00251                         gamma=atan2(y,x)*(180/PI);//Fai and convert to degrees
00252                         double bij=-1.054571726e-11* //h_bar*e-7/(amstrong*amstrong*amstrong)
00253                                 ((Tensor^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->A->isotope->Magnetogyric*
00254                                 ((Tensor^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->B->isotope->Magnetogyric
00255                                 /(2*PI*((Tensor^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->matrix3x3[0]*
00256                                 ((Tensor^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->matrix3x3[0]*
00257                                 ((Tensor^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->matrix3x3[0]);
00258 
00259                         //Write dipolar coupling in appropriate format
00260                         Dipolar+="      dipole "+
00261                                 AtomIDs[((Tensor^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->A->ID]+" "+
00262                                 AtomIDs[((Tensor^)SystemModel->InteractionCollection[i])->B->ID]+" "+
00263                                 To_String(bij)+" "+ 
00264                                 To_String(alpha)+" "+ To_String(beta)+" "+ To_String(gamma)+" \r\n";
00265                 };
00266 
00267         };
00268 
00269         //Write all the above in the stream in the correct format
00270         FileText+=ChemicalShift;
00271         FileText+=JCoupling;
00272         FileText+=Quadrupolar;
00273         FileText+=Dipolar;
00274         FileText+="\r\n  \r\n } \r\n";
00275 
00276         //This is a basic simpson script which append at the end of our data in order to run in the simpson
00277         FileText+="#--------------------------------------------------------------------\r\n";
00278         FileText+="# A basic SIMPSON simulation route is appended below,\r\n";
00279         FileText+="# please edit as appropriate for your specific case.\r\n";
00280         FileText+="#--------------------------------------------------------------------\r\n";
00281 
00282         FileText+="\r\n";
00283         FileText+="par {\r\n";
00284         FileText+="proton_frequency 600e6 \r\n";
00285         FileText+="spin_rate        0 \r\n";
00286         FileText+="sw               20000 \r\n";
00287         FileText+="start_operator   I1x \r\n";
00288         FileText+="detect_operator  I1p \r\n";
00289         FileText+="gamma_angles     1 \r\n";
00290         FileText+="verbose          1101 \r\n";
00291         FileText+="np               256 \r\n";
00292         FileText+="crystal_file     zcw4180 \r\n";
00293         FileText+="} \r\n";
00294 
00295         FileText+="\r\n";
00296         FileText+="proc pulseq {} {\r\n";
00297         FileText+="     acq_block { \r\n";
00298         FileText+="         delay 20 \r\n";
00299         FileText+="     } \r\n";
00300         FileText+="} \r\n";
00301 
00302 
00303         FileText+="\r\n";
00304         FileText+="proc main {} {\r\n";
00305         FileText+="global par \r\n";
00306         FileText+="set f [fsimpson] \r\n";
00307         FileText+="fsave $f $par(name).fid \r\n";
00308         FileText+="faddlb $f 50 0 \r\n";
00309         FileText+="fzerofill $f 4096 \r\n";
00310         FileText+="fft $f \r\n";
00311         FileText+="fsave $f $par(name).spe \r\n";
00312         FileText+="funload $f \r\n";
00313         FileText+="} \r\n";
00314 
00315         //Convert and write to the file
00316         array<Byte>^ info = (gcnew UTF8Encoding( true ))->GetBytes(FileText);
00317         WritingFile->Write( info, 0, info->Length  );
00318         WritingFile->Close();
00319 }

00322 /**
00323 * @brief EventHandler for opening the save dialoguebox and  writing the stream to file.
00324 * @param sender The object that fire this event.
00325 * @param e The event arguments for this event handler.
00326 */
00327 Void Simpson::Exportbutton_Click(System::Object^  sender, System::EventArgs^  e)
00328 {
00329         //Setting the format and initila filename for the save dialoguebox 
00330         saveFileDialog->Filter="Simpson File|*.in";
00331         saveFileDialog->FileName=Path::GetFileNameWithoutExtension(FileName)+".in";
00332 
00333         //Opens the save dialogue box and check if the OK button clicked then save to file
00334         if (saveFileDialog->ShowDialog() == System::Windows::Forms::DialogResult::OK )
00335                 WriteFile(saveFileDialog->FileName);
00336 }
